name: just breathe granny square
notes:
this forever-free on my blog 12 inch granny square pattern was originally designed in red heart with love and caron one pound yarn, with a 6mm/j hook especially for the [2024 moogly crochet alon][1]g. i am delighted to be involved in this annual cal for a second time; you can find my forever free 12 inch granny square from the 2022 moogly cal [right here][2]!

you can also purchase an ad-free low-cost pdf copy of this pattern, which includes all the speciality stitch photo tutorials and step-by-step pattern pictures ♥

originally designed in 100% premium acrylic red heart with love and caron one pound yarn, with a 6mm/j hook. i've also made this square using various 100% worsted weight cotton yarns with appropriate hook size (per ball band). all work up beautifully!

fully tested and guaranteed error-free crochet pattern ♥

all specialty stitches used are directly linked in the specialty stitch key to my popular photo stitch tutorials (pdf version includes all photo tutorials in full). no need to google if a stitch is new to you -  i've got your back! you can also reach out to me via email for pattern support pam@bestcrochetlife.com

note: instructions to create the blanket are not included. my "just breathe" blanket in the photos is one of a kind - as yours will be!!!

update 2025: i have now participated in the moogly cal 3 times. all 3 patterns are available for free on my website bestcrochetlife(dot)com as well as available here individually on ravelry or as a marked down bundle of 3 compatible patterns so you can create your own beautiful blanket!

⬇️click here to pop the bundle in your cart⬇️
https://www.ravelry.com/redeem/best-crochet-life?sale=400492

equinox 2025: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/equinox-granny-s...
just breathe 2024: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/just-breathe-gra...
mayanna 2022: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/mayanna-granny-s...

every single pattern has been made by hundreds of crocheters as part of the cal! the pdfs contain all the specialty stitch photos tutorials as well as full written patterns with lots of guidance photos. pattern support is also available.

check out more of my crochet patterns [here on ravelry][3]! i'm also an etsy star seller with over 200 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ reviews - [click here][4] to read happy customer testimonials :)

enjoy, have fun, please share your makes, i love to see them. happy hooking! pam xx


  [1]: https://www.mooglyblog.com/cal-2024-22/
  [2]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/mayanna-granny-square
